summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Valentine Week - The Seven Chapter Protocol app. All 8 Valentine Week chapters (Feb 7-14) are working correctly with proper content, games, and navigation. Minor text inconsistencies found.

issues: Text says '7 days. 7 chapters. 1 truth.' but should be '8 days. 8 chapters. 1 truth.' (line 229 in LandingPage.jsx)
Title shows 'SEVEN_CHAPTERS' but Valentine Week has 8 days
Only 7 milestones defined but should be 8 to match Valentine Week (line 104 in ReflectionSystem.jsx)

action_items: Update LandingPage.jsx line 229: Change '7 days. 7 chapters. 1 truth.' to '8 days. 8 chapters. 1 truth.'
Update LandingPage.jsx title: Consider changing 'SEVEN_CHAPTERS' to 'EIGHT_CHAPTERS' or 'VALENTINE_WEEK'
Update ReflectionSystem.jsx line 104: Add 8th milestone to match Valentine Week days
critical_code_review_comments: Minor text inconsistency: Landing page and JourneyProgress show 7 chapters/milestones but app has 8 Valentine Week days
All 8 chapters are functional and accessible - this is just a display text issue

success_rate.frontend: 95% - All functionality works, minor text inconsistencies

context_for_next_testing_agent: Valentine Week app with 8 chapters (Feb 7-14). All chapters unlocked in dev mode (accessGranted: true in GameContext). Personal story includes: Argha from Dhanbad (DOB 04-10-1994), Shivani from Indore (DOB 14 May 1998), wrong number meeting, Diwali with Amit & Abhilasha, veg/non-veg differences. Games: MemoryMatchGame, RoadTripGame, ShieldDefenseGame, ConnectHeartsGame, BuildHomeGame, CatchRingGame.

chapter_hub.details: All 8 Valentine Week days displayed with correct emojis, dates, titles, and subtitles. Progress shows 0/8.

hug_day_feb_12.details: Support moments: birthday, Diwali with Amit & Abhilasha, Build Home game

kiss_day_feb_13.details: Revelation that SHE is the achievement, journey summary with all milestones

yes_forever_response.details: Shows YES! celebration, 'I love you. Forever.', 'Valentine's Week Complete • All 8 Chapters Unlocked'

dev_mode_all_chapters_unlocked.details: All 8 chapters accessible without completing previous ones
